name: 4x4 Trial Kinematic Offroad
description:
Take part in the race on cars without rules Riding off-road, go to the race on cars with good realistic graphics. Conquer bumpy roads, climb steep hills, depend on impenetrable swamps, travel around huge trees, abandoning all the laws of physics and common sense in self-preservation!
Choose one of 4 × 4 SUVs specially prepared for conquest of severe off-road, such cars you will not meet in the city or on the roads. Set up a race on the machines on the mud for a while, get ahead of all rivals, showing the elapsed time of passing special sections of the road. Forget about the kind of asphalt or gravel country road, be ready to join the fight against dirt. When conquering steep slopes, be sure to include a lower gear and off-road driving will be much easier. Before you open beautiful landscapes, green plains, bumpy trails, various weather conditions.

Feature of the game:
- roads run through swamps and forests, driving will be provided by extreme;
- special gearbox with lowering gears;
- precise control with natural physics of driving;
- on the roads there are many difficult obstacles;
- difficult tasks at the time of passage, powerful cars, simple control.

Do not forget about the time when you feel in the race, try to squeeze the maximum speed off-road and keep within the allotted time of arrival. Free all the power of an SUV in races on impassable terrain. Find new ways by shortening the time of the mission for your SUV.
For the time of racing races you will have to forget completely about the comfort of a comfortable ride. Feel like a real racer 4 × 4 in extreme conditions will have to rely only on the acquired driving skills.
